About Me

Hi! My name is Unnati Verma. I am a Web Developer, who continuously strives for excellence and is passionate about acquiring new technologies. Building user-friendly and responsive web applications, along with the expertise in Backend development has become a passion of mine. I have more than 2 years of experience in domain of Investment Banking, building large-scale platforms for mutual fund companies.

Tech Stack

WaitlistedLabs

The project is a webapp of waitlist management for startups. An interested customer can register, login or give a feedback. There is point based system using referrals which helps improve the position of user in the waitlist.

Tech Stack : Angular 6 | Material UI | Bootstap | SASS | FireBase

Pig Game

The project is a two-player dice game, where players can roll dice in rounds. The player can keep rolling the dice as long as he chooses to, and can hold and add the accumulated score to the global score. The first player to achieve the score manually added or 50 points, alongwith the specific rules, wins.

Tech Stack : Vanilla JS | HTML5 | CSS

Customer App

The project is a list view for a customer base. The primary objective being implementation of Redux state management tool in Angular, by manipulating data in Store for different actions dispatched.

Tech Stack : NgRx-Redux | Angular 6 | Material UI | Bootstrap | SASS
